actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

official_title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on jacquard cards and to include in the suspension plastic jacquard cards and other cards to be used as jacquard cards.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1992, the suspension of duty on certain jacquard cards. Includes other types of jacquard cards in such suspension.

titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on jacquard cards and to include in the suspension plastic jacquard cards and other cards to be used as jacquard cards.
